Container.Name: Walkabout
Container.Overview:
Walkabout is a self-hosted flight deal intelligence platform that aggregates deals, tracks prices, monitors award availability, and provides AI-powered insights for your routes.
NOTE: Walkabout is designed as a personal internal app for your home network. It is not intended to be published to a public domain.
Features: - React SPA with dark/light mode and mobile-responsive design - Deal aggregation from 15+ RSS sources (Secret Flying, OMAAT, TPG) - Multi-source price data (SerpAPI, Amadeus, Google Flights scraper) - Award flight tracking via Seats.aero - AI-powered deal explanations, trip planning, and award analysis - Statistical deal detection (z-score analysis) - Push notifications via ntfy or Discord
All API keys and settings are configured in-app via the Settings page.
Also check out Facet - a self-hosted personal profile platform: https://github.com/jesposito/Facet
